contentrichtext.text: <!--uncomment if needed ''For the current|defunct federal|provincial electoral district, see [[Québec—Montmorency (electoral district)]]'' ---> '''Québec—Montmorency''' was a federal [[electoral district (Canada)|electoral district]] in [[Quebec]], [[Canada]], that was represented in the [[Canadian House of Commons]] from 1935 to 1968. This riding was created in 1924 from parts of [[Charlevoix—Montmorency]] and [[Quebec County (electoral district)|Quebec County]] [[Riding (division)|ridings]]. It was abolished in 1966 when it was redistributed into [[Louis-Hébert]], [[Montmorency (electoral district)|Montmorency]] and [[Portneuf (electoral district)|Portneuf]] [[Riding (division)|ridings]]. ==Members of Parliament== This riding elected the following [[Member of Parliament|Members of Parliament]]: #[[Henri-Edgar Lavigueur]], [[Liberal Party of Canada|Liberal]] (1925–1930) #[[Charles-Napoléon Dorion]], [[Conservative Party of Canada (historic)|Conservative]] (1930–1935) #[[Wilfrid Lacroix]], Liberal (1935–1958) #[[Robert Lafrenière]], [[Progressive Conservative Party of Canada|Progressive Conservative]] (1958–1962) #[[Guy Marcoux]], [[Social Credit Party of Canada|Social Credit]] (1962–1965) #[[Ovide Laflamme]], Liberal (1965–1968) ==Election results== {{Canadian Raymond Laliberté|3,282}} {{end}} {{Canadian election result/top|CA|1965}} {{CANelec|CA|Liberal|[[Ovide Laflamme]]|30,084}} {{CANelec|CA|Ralliement créditiste|Henri Borgia|14,720}} {{CANelec|CA|NDP|René Gobeil|7,709}} {{CANelec|CA|Independent|Guy Marcoux|7,117}} {{CANelec|CA|PC|André Asselin|5,811}} {{end}} == See also == * [[List of Canadian federal electoral districts]] * [[Past Canadian electoral districts]] ==External links== * [http://www2.parl.gc.ca/Sites/LOP/HFER/hfer.asp?Language=E&Search=Det&Include=Y&rid=579 Riding history from the] [[Library of Parliament]] {{DEFAULTSORT:Quebec—Montmorency}} [[Category:Defunct Quebec federal electoral districts]]
